articles.title: Korra Obidi: Social media divided over timing of husband’s divorce announcement - Ripples Nigeria
articles.description: Nigerian entertainment polymath, Korra Obidi has continued to top the trending list on the social media platform, Twitter in the last 48 hours since her Caucasian husband, Dr. Justin Dean, a chiropractor shockingly announced that he was getting a divorce. The…

articles.title: Capital A rejected RM500m Danajamin loan due to unreasonable terms, says CEO Tony Fernandes - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (March 11): Tan Sri Tony Fernandes, chief executive officer of Capital A Bhd (formerly known as AirAsia Group Bhd), has clarified that the group decided not to proceed with a club facility of up to RM500 million under the Danajamin Prihatin Guara…

articles.title: Sezairi celebrates becoming first Singapore artiste to hit 100 million streams on Spotify - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: In an Instagram post announcing the news, the local singer said he wrote It’s You “with the conscious thought that I wanted to turn my life around and be a better person, husband, lover and human being”.
articles.content: Local singer Sezairi Sezali had a big announcement to make earlier this week. In a social media post on Monday (Mar 7), he wrote that he was the first Singapore artist to have 100 million streams for… [+533 chars]
